what: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data
title: SaltsR - Tools for the analysis of salt formation data
text: SaltsR data science tool aid scientists, researchers, conservators managers cultural heritage interested protecting heritage salt weathering. KIK-IRPA PREDICT: https://predict.kikirpa./ Salt Wiki: https://www.saltwiki.net/index.php/Home ECOS – RUNSALT : http://science.sdf-eu.org/runsalt/ MDCS / Monument Diagnosis Conservation System : https://mdcs.monumentenkennis.nl/

title: Calculate Salt Balance — SaltBalance
text: function calculates salt balance based dry sample mass, water amount, ion concentrations.

title: Calculate Salt Balance — SaltBalance
text: https://zenodo.org/records/6280617#.Yic0yKvMJjE

title: Calculate Salt Balance — SaltBalance
text: m_s Numeric. Dry Sample Mass, m_s (g) V_w Numeric. Amount water added sample IC, V_w (ml) conc Data frame. Raw Ion Chromatography Data (IC) (mg L^(-1)) containing following columns: chloride: Chloride (Cl-) Concentration nitrate: Nitrate (NO3-) Concentration sulfate: Sulfate (SO42-) Concentration sodium: Sodium (Na+) Concentration potassium: Potassium (K+) Concentration calcium: Calcium (Ca2+) Concentration magnesium: Magnesium (Mg2+) Concentration

title: Calculate Salt Balance — SaltBalance
text: list containing: pathway selected pathway (II) cat.adj Adjusted cations x_adj Adjusted mole fractions w_f Final weight fractions w_eval data frame evaluation metrics

what: Calculating salt balance from ion chromatography data (now deprecated for updated version) — fun_salt_calcs_old
title: Calculating salt balance from ion chromatography data (now deprecated for updated version) — fun_salt_calcs_old
text: Performs salt balance ion chromatography data returns outputs ECOS Runsalt software. function now deprecated replaced new function.
